key_facts.claim: World Labs: a spatial intelligence AI company building Large World Models (LWMs) to perceive, generate, and interact with the 3D world.
Today we’re sharing RTFM, a new real-time generative World Model. RTFM (Real-Time Frame Model) generates video in real-time as you interact with it.
World Models, taking AI beyond language and 2D visuals into the realm of complex 3D environments, both virtual and real.
To date we have raised more than $230M in total funding led by Martin Casado and Sarah Wang of Andreessen Horowitz, Scott Sandell of NEA, and Jordan Jacobs of Radical Ventures.
World Labs was founded by visionary AI pioneer Fei-Fei Li along with Justin Johnson, Christoph Lassner, and Ben Mildenhall; each a world-renowned technologist in computer vision and graphics.
